dcterms:creator: S. Hinterstoisser
V. Lepetit
S. Ilic
S. Holzer
G. Bradski
K. Konolige
N. Navab
dcterms:description: The LINEMOD dataset includes 1200 images per object, with a training set containing 180 samples. The dataset is augmented by rendering objects with random rotations and translations onto background images from the MSCOCO dataset, resulting in a total of 1480 images per object for training.
dcterms:title: LINEMOD

dcterms:creator: E. Brachmann
A. Krull
F. Michel
S. Gumhold
J. Shotton
C. Rother
dcterms:description: Occlusion LINEMOD is a re-annotation of the LINEMOD dataset, comprising a subset of 1215 challenging test images of partially occluded objects. The dataset is used to verify the robustness of pose estimation methods.
dcterms:title: Occlusion LINEMOD

dcterms:creator: Y. Xiang
T. Schmidt
V. Narayanan
D. Fox
dcterms:description: YCB-Video is a large dataset containing 130K key frames of 21 objects over 92 videos. It includes both real and synthetic images for training and testing, with a focus on 6D object pose estimation.
dcterms:title: YCB-Video
